channel.title: Comments on: ‘Meat was so sixty million years agAAAGHH…’

item.title: By: Mike Keesey (@tmkeesey)
item.dc:creator: Mike Keesey (@tmkeesey)
item.description:
Go outside and tell me what you see more of, plants or animals.
Also, switching diets makes you no more or less of a prey item than you already were.
item.content:encoded:
Go outside and tell me what you see more of, plants or animals.

Also, switching diets makes you no more or less of a prey item than you already were.

item.title: By: littlewonder2
item.dc:creator: littlewonder2
item.description: Something would have had to happen to make them need to change their diet, I reckon. I don't know about the evolution of therozinosaurs, but maybe it could've been like a climate change that meant their usual prey disappeared or something like that.
item.content:encoded: Something would have had to happen to make them need to change their diet, I reckon. I don’t know about the evolution of therozinosaurs, but maybe it could’ve been like a climate change that meant their usual prey disappeared or something like that.
